activities:
1.	Website - Acquis may receive unsolicited personally-identifiable information from EU citizens themselves who submit resumes or request information about our company.   We collect this information for internal use only and may use it to respond to them.  This information is not released to any third parties for any purpose.
2.	Consulting Services - Acquis may receive personally-identifiable information of EU citizens who are customers of our clients or are employed by them.  This information is received from our clients only in the course of performing consulting services such as data management or processing.  We receive this information solely as an agent of our client and pursuant to written contracts.  The information is not used for any purposes other than those specified in the contract.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: None.  Use of the data from EU residents themselves through our website is governed by our posted privacy policy - Acquis does not disclose personally identifiable information of third parties except in the course of responding to the resident.  Use of personally identifiable information received from Acquis's clients is governed exclusively by contracts with the clients who supply or arrange access to the data.
